code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Menu,X}from'lucide-react';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const[scrolled,setScrolled]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const isScrolled=window.scrollY>50;setScrolled(isScrolled);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);const scrollToSection=sectionId=>{const element=document.getElementById(sectionId);if(element){element.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});}setIsOpen(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar ".concat(scrolled?'scrolled':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Chun Lin"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links ".concat(isOpen?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('about'),children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('skills'),children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('projects'),children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('photography'),children:"Photography"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>scrollToSection('contact'),children:"Contact"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-toggle",onClick:()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen),children:isOpen?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{size:24}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{size:24})})]})})});};export default Navbar;
